articles.title: 2 children killed at Miami sailing camp after barge collides with their boat, authorities say
articles.description: A barge collided with a sailboat carrying five children and an adult in Miami's Biscayne Bay, resulting in the deaths of two young children. Rescue divers searched the waters for survivors.

articles.title: Gunman kills 4, including police officer, in shooting at New York City office tower
articles.description: A gunman opened fire in a New York City office tower, killing four people, including a police officer. The shooter's motive and the full extent of the casualties are still being determined.

articles.title: 147 Palestinians Starve to Death; Netanyahu Denies Starvation in Gaza
articles.description: Health officials in Gaza report at least 147 Palestinians have starved to death, including 88 children. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu denies that starvation is occurring in Gaza.
